trans-unit.source: The SearchResultCollection class contains the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"></xref> instances that the Active Directory hierarchy returned during a <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher"></xref> query.
trans-unit.target: A classe SearchResultCollection contém o <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"> </xref> instâncias hierarquia do Active Directory retornada durante um <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher"> </xref> consulta.

trans-unit.source: Due to implementation restrictions, the SearchResultCollection class cannot release all of its unmanaged resources when it is garbage collected.
trans-unit.target: Devido a restrições de implementação, a classe SearchResultCollection não é possível liberar todos os seus recursos não gerenciados quando é coletado como lixo.

trans-unit.source: To prevent a memory leak, you must call the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose%2A> method when the SearchResultCollection object is no longer needed.
trans-unit.target: Para evitar um vazamento de memória, você deve chamar o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose%2A>método quando o objeto SearchResultCollection não é mais necessário.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: Determines if a specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"></xref> object is in this collection.
trans-unit.target: Determina se um especificado <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"> </xref> objeto está nesta coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"></xref> object to find.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"> </xref> objeto a ser encontrado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified property belongs to this collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a propriedade especificada pertence a esta coleção; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Copies all <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"></xref> objects in this collection to the specific array, starting at the specified index in the target array.
trans-unit.target: Copia todos os <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"> </xref> objetos na coleção para a matriz específica, começando no índice especificado na matriz de destino.

trans-unit.source: The array of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"></xref> objects that receives the elements of this collection.
trans-unit.target: A matriz de <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"> </xref> objetos que recebe os elementos desta coleção.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in `results` where this method starts copying this collection.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero no `results` onde esse método inicia a cópia desta coleção.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"></xref> objects in this collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"> </xref> objetos nesta coleção.

trans-unit.source: The number of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"></xref> objects in this collection.
trans-unit.target: O número de <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"> </xref> objetos nesta coleção.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources that are used by the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Libera todos os recursos que são usados pelo <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method, it allows the resources that are used by the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection> to be reallocated for other purposes.
trans-unit.target: O método Dispose, ele permite que os recursos que são usados pelo <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection>para ser realocada para outros fins.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection>

trans-unit.source: For more information about Dispose, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre Dispose, consulte [limpeza de recursos não gerenciados](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The garbage collector does not release memory for a <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: O coletor de lixo não liberar memória para um <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection>objeto.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, an application must call the Dispose method explicitly to prevent a memory leak.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, um aplicativo deve chamar o método Dispose explicitamente para evitar um vazamento de memória.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection"></xref> object and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos não gerenciados usados pelo <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection"> </xref> de objeto e, opcionalmente, libera os recursos gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose%2A> method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo público <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose%2A>método e o <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>método.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose%2A> invokes the protected Dispose method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose%2A>invoca o método Dispose protegido com o `disposing` parâmetro definido como `true`.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes Dispose with the `disposing` parameter set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>chama Dispose com o `disposing` parâmetro definido como `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources that are held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `disposing` parâmetro é `true`, esse método libera todos os recursos que são mantidos por qualquer objeto gerenciado que este <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection>referências.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection>

trans-unit.source: The garbage collector does not release memory for a <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: O coletor de lixo não liberar memória para um <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection>objeto.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you must call the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose%2A> method explicitly to prevent a memory leak.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, você deve chamar o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose%2A>método explicitamente para evitar um vazamento de memória.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose%2A> method of each object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Este método chama o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose%2A>método de cada objeto na coleção.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose> and <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose>e <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>, consulte [limpeza de recursos não gerenciados](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [substituindo o método Finalize](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para liberar recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para liberar apenas recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Overrides the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Substitui o <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> método.

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that you can use to iterate through this collection.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um enumerador que você pode usar para percorrer a esta coleção.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> object that you can use to iterate through this collection.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>objeto que você pode usar para percorrer a esta coleção.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Gets the handle that is returned by the [IDirectorySearch::ExecuteSearch](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/idirectorysearch_executesearch.asp) method that performs the actual search.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o identificador que é retornado pelo [IDirectorySearch::ExecuteSearch](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/idirectorysearch_executesearch.asp) método que executa a pesquisa real.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the [IDirectorySearch::ExecuteSearch](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/idirectorysearch_executesearch.asp) topic in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte o [IDirectorySearch::ExecuteSearch](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/idirectorysearch_executesearch.asp) tópico na biblioteca MSDN em [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher> that created this collection calls the [IDirectorySearch::ExecuteSearch](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/idirectorysearch_executesearch.asp) method, which makes the query results available to the T:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher>que criou esta coleção chama o [IDirectorySearch::ExecuteSearch](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/idirectorysearch_executesearch.asp) método, que disponibiliza os resultados da consulta para o objeto T:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the [IDirectorySearch::ExecuteSearch](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/idirectorysearch_executesearch.asp) topic in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte o [IDirectorySearch::ExecuteSearch](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/idirectorysearch_executesearch.asp) tópico na biblioteca MSDN em [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).

trans-unit.source: Each time that a query is performed, a handle for the results of that query is associated with its <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: Cada vez que uma consulta é executada, um identificador para os resultados da consulta está associado com seu <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection>objeto.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection>

trans-unit.source: This handle corresponds to the search handle in ADSI.
trans-unit.target: Esse identificador corresponde ao identificador de pesquisa na ADSI.

trans-unit.source: This handle persists until you call the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose> method on the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection> object, so you must call <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose> to prevent a memory leak.
trans-unit.target: Esse identificador persiste até que você chamar o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose>método o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection>do objeto, você deve chamar <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose>para evitar um vazamento de memória.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose>

trans-unit.source: The garbage collector does not free memory for this particular object.
trans-unit.target: O coletor de lixo não libera memória para esse objeto.

trans-unit.source: The ADS_SEARCH_HANDLE value that this collection uses.
trans-unit.target: O valor ADS_SEARCH_HANDLE que usa essa coleção.

trans-unit.source: Returns the index of the first occurrence of the specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"></xref> object in this collection.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o índice da primeira ocorrência do <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"> </xref> objeto na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"></xref> object to search for in this collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"> </xref> objeto a ser pesquisado na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first matching object.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero do primeiro objeto correspondente.

trans-unit.source: Returns -1 if no member of this collection is identical to the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Retornará -1 se nenhum membro dessa coleção é idêntico de <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"></xref> object that is located at a specified index in this collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"> </xref> objeto está localizado em um índice especificado na coleção.

trans-unit.source: In C#, this property is the indexer for the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: No c#, essa propriedade é o indexador de <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection>classe.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection>

trans-unit.source: In JScript, you can use the default indexed properties defined by a type, but you cannot explicitly define your own.
trans-unit.target: No JScript, você pode usar as propriedades indexadas padrão definidas por um tipo, mas você não pode definir explicitamente as suas próprias.

trans-unit.source: However, specifying the expando attribute on a class automatically provides a default indexed property whose type is Object and with an index type of <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, especificar o atributo expando em uma classe fornece automaticamente um padrão cujo tipo é um objeto de propriedade indexada e com um tipo de índice de <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"></xref> object to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero de <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"> </xref> objeto a ser recuperado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"></xref> object that is located at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"> </xref> objeto que está localizado no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher"></xref> properties that were specified before the search was executed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher"> </xref> propriedades que foram especificadas para a pesquisa foi executada.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref:System.String> that contains the properties that were specified in the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.PropertiesToLoad*> property collection before the search was executed.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz do tipo <xref:System.String>que contém as propriedades que foram especificadas no <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.PropertiesToLoad*>coleção de propriedades antes que a pesquisa foi executada.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.PropertiesToLoad*> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Copies the elements of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> to an <xref:System.Array>, starting at a particular <xref:System.Array> index.
trans-unit.target: Copia os elementos do <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>para um <xref:System.Array>, a partir de um determinado <xref:System.Array>índice.</xref:System.Array> </xref:System.Array> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> that is the destination of the elements copied from <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.
trans-unit.target: Unidimensional <xref:System.Array>que é o destino dos elementos copiados de <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array> must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Array>devem ter a indexação com base em zero.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in `array` at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero no `array` no qual a cópia começa.

trans-unit.source: array is .
trans-unit.target: arrayis .

trans-unit.source: index is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: indexé menor que zero.

trans-unit.source: array is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: arrayé multidimensional.

trans-unit.source: -or- The number of elements in the source is greater than the available space from index to the end of the destination array.
trans-unit.target: o número de elementos na origem - ou - é maior que o espaço disponível do index até o final do destino array.

trans-unit.source: The type of the source cannot be cast automatically to the type of the destination array.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de origem não pode ser convertido automaticamente para o tipo de destino array .

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether access to the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o acesso para o <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>é sincronizado (thread-safe).</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A> returns an object, which can be used to synchronize access to the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>Retorna um objeto, que pode ser usado para sincronizar o acesso <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection></xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: Most collection classes in the <xref:System.Collections?displayProperty=fullName> namespace also implement a Synchronized method, which provides a synchronized wrapper around the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: Coleta a maioria das classes de <xref:System.Collections?displayProperty=fullName>namespace também implementa um método sincronizado, que fornece um wrapper sincronizado para a coleção subjacente.</xref:System.Collections?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: Enumerar através de uma coleção intrinsecamente não é um procedimento de segurança do thread.

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Mesmo quando uma coleção é sincronizada, outros threads ainda podem modificar a coleção, o que faz com que o enumerador lançar uma exceção.

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: Para garantir a segurança de thread durante a enumeração, você pode bloquear a coleção durante toda a enumeração ou capture as exceções resultante de alterações feitas por outros threads.

trans-unit.source: [Visual Basic, C#] The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A> during the entire enumeration: ```c# ICollection myCollection = new ICollection(); lock(myCollection.SyncRoot) { foreach (Object item in myCollection) { // Insert your code here. } } ``` ```vb# Dim myCollection As New ICollection() Dim item As Object SyncLock myCollection.SyncRoot For Each item In myCollection ' Insert your code here. Next item End SyncLock ```
trans-unit.target: [Visual Basic, c#] O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como bloquear a coleção usando o <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>durante toda a enumeração: ```c# ICollection myCollection = new ICollection(); lock(myCollection.SyncRoot) { foreach (Object item in myCollection) { // Insert your code here. } } ``` ```vb# Dim myCollection As New ICollection() Dim item As Object SyncLock myCollection.SyncRoot For Each item In myCollection ' Insert your code here. Next item End SyncLock ``` </xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if access to the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se acessar para o <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>é sincronizado (thread-safe); caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um objeto que pode ser usado para sincronizar o acesso <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: For collections whose underlying store is not publicly available, the expected implementation is to return the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Para coleções cujo repositório subjacente não está disponível publicamente, a implementação esperada é retornar a instância atual.

trans-unit.source: Note that the pointer to the current instance might not be sufficient for collections that wrap other collections; those should return the underlying collection's `SyncRoot` property.
trans-unit.target: Observe que o ponteiro para a instância atual pode não ser suficiente para coleções que agrupam outras coleções; aqueles devem retornar a coleção subjacente `SyncRoot` propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Most collection classes in the <xref:System.Collections?displayProperty=fullName> namespace also implement a `Synchronized` method, which provides a synchronized wrapper around the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: Coleta a maioria das classes de <xref:System.Collections?displayProperty=fullName>namespace também implementam um `Synchronized` método, que fornece um wrapper sincronizado para a coleção subjacente.</xref:System.Collections?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: However, derived classes can provide their own synchronized version of the collection using the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, as classes derivadas podem fornecer sua própria versão sincronizada de coleção usando o <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: The synchronizing code must perform operations on the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A> of the collection, not directly on the collection.
trans-unit.target: O código de sincronização necessário realizar operações no <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>da coleção, não diretamente na coleção.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects.
trans-unit.target: Isso garante que a operação correta de coleções que são derivados de outros objetos.

trans-unit.source: Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the collection instance.
trans-unit.target: Especificamente, ele mantém uma sincronização adequada com outros threads que podem ser simultaneamente modificando a instância de coleção.

trans-unit.source: In the absence of a `Synchronized` method on a collection, the expected usage for <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A> looks like this: ```c# ICollection MyCollection =... lock(MyCollection.SyncRoot) { // Some operation on the collection, which is now thread safe. } ``` [Visual Basic] ``` Dim myCollection as New ICollection() SyncLock myCollection.SyncRoot ' Some operation on the collection, which is now thread safe. End SyncLock ``` Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: Na ausência de um `Synchronized` método em uma coleção, o uso esperado para <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>tem esta aparência: ```c# ICollection MyCollection =... lock(MyCollection.SyncRoot) { // Some operation on the collection, which is now thread safe. } ``` [Visual Basic] ``` Dim myCollection as New ICollection() SyncLock myCollection.SyncRoot ' Some operation on the collection, which is now thread safe. End SyncLock ``` enumerando através de um conjunto não é intrinsecamente um procedimento com segurança de thread.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Mesmo quando uma coleção é sincronizada, outros threads ainda podem modificar a coleção, o que faz com que o enumerador lançar uma exceção.

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: Para garantir a segurança de thread durante a enumeração, você pode bloquear a coleção durante toda a enumeração ou capture as exceções resultante de alterações feitas por outros threads.

trans-unit.source: [Visual Basic, C#] The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A> during the entire enumeration: ```c# ICollection myCollection = new ICollection(); lock(myCollection.SyncRoot) { foreach (Object item in myCollection) { // Insert your code here. } } ``` ```vb# Dim myCollection As New ICollection() Dim item As Object SyncLock myCollection.SyncRoot For Each item In myCollection ' Insert your code here. Next item End SyncLock ```
trans-unit.target: [Visual Basic, c#] O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como bloquear a coleção usando o <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>durante toda a enumeração: ```c# ICollection myCollection = new ICollection(); lock(myCollection.SyncRoot) { foreach (Object item in myCollection) { // Insert your code here. } } ``` ```vb# Dim myCollection As New ICollection() Dim item As Object SyncLock myCollection.SyncRoot For Each item In myCollection ' Insert your code here. Next item End SyncLock ``` </xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que pode ser usado para sincronizar o acesso <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>
